title: Programmer
mssage:
Job Requirements: 

  Holder of Higher Diploma or higher accreditation in IT or related disciplines, demonstrating a strong foundation in software development principles.

  At least 1 year of relevant working experience, with a track record of successful project delivery

  Hands on development experience in Java, PHP, Python, React, RDBMS (MSSQL / MySQL)

title: Java Programmer

Hands on experience in Java programming development
Experience in Java Application Framework

Candidates with less experience / Fresh Graduates are also welcome to apply for Junior Programmers

title: IT Administrator
mssage:
Procurement Management:

  - Handle the full procurement process, including sourcing, evaluating, and purchasing IT hardware, software, and services. 

  - Prepare, issue, and evaluate contracts, tenders, and quotations, ensuring compliance with organizational policies and budgetary requirements. 

  - Utilize the electronic purchase system to process and track procurement activities efficiently. 

  - Build and maintain relationships with vendors to negotiate favorable terms and ensure timely delivery. 

- Stock Control and Asset Management:

  - Maintain and update IT inventory, including hardware, software, and consumables. 

  - Perform regular audits of stock to ensure accuracy and availability of critical equipment. 

  - Coordinate stock replenishment to avoid shortages and ensure operational continuity. 

- Data Management and Analysis:

  - Manage and organize IT-related data, including procurement records, inventory logs, and helpdesk performance data. 

  - Use Microsoft Excel and other tools to analyze data, generate reports, and identify trends. 

  - Provide actionable insights to improve procurement efficiency, optimize stock levels, and enhance IT operations. 

- Guideline and Documentation Preparation:

  - Develop and maintain procurement guidelines and workflows to improve operational efficiency. 

  - Document IT processes, including procurement procedures, asset management, and helpdesk ticket handling. 

  - Provide clear and structured guidelines to team members and stakeholders. 

- Helpdesk Hotline and Ticket Dispatching: 

  - Serve as the first point of contact for IT-related inquiries via the helpdesk hotline. 

  - Log and categorize incoming IT support tickets in the ticketing system. 

  - Dispatch tickets to appropriate IT team members and monitor progress to ensure timely resolution. 

  - Communicate updates to end-users and provide basic IT support when needed. 

- General IT Operational Support: 

  - Assist with onboarding and offboarding processes, including hardware provisioning and account setup. 

  - Collaborate with IT team members to ensure smooth coordination of departmental tasks and initiatives.

title: Programmer
mssage:
